Caseyville Ky Jany 6th 1862
Hon Beriah McGoffin
Gov of Comth of Ky
Dr Sir

About the 1st of Sept last I resigned my office as police Judge of Caseyville since which time I have been chiefly in the Southern Confederacy. my resignation was duly published in our County paper the Union Town News. I am Informed that it requres the Gov to be duly notified of it. Supposing that a notice of it in a publick Journal was sufficient. I neglected to do so. Mr H A Ransom of this place has been duly elected in my stead and Cannot act until he receves his Commission for the unexpired term. by forwarding it to him You will verry much oblige your

Caseyville Jany 6th 1862
Hon Beriah McGoffin
Gov of the Comth of Kentucky
